author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. Obsessed with these key lime pie bars! 2. I am still in love my with oura ring. Just an FYI. 3. How to slow down your summer. Obsessed. 4. I want to make a goal of eating outside at least three times a week this summer. 5. I totally agree that jalapeños seem less […]
text: 1. Obsessed with these key lime pie bars! 2. I am still in love my with oura ring. Just an FYI. 3. How to slow down your summer. Obsessed. 4. I want to make a goal of eating outside at least three times a week this summer. 5. I totally agree that jalapeños seem less spicier these days. 6. TV things!! I watched all of Sirens – oh so good! I love Julianne Moore. And the episode of Your Friends and Neighbors was so good! 7. A working mom’s tips on how she reads so many books! 8. New podcast love alert: The Dating Detectives. One of you mentioned it and I almost binged the whole thing already. It’s like really excellent versions of catfish. 9. I live in dresses in the summer (they’re just so easy) and have found SO many good ones on amazon the last two seasons. Very pleasantly surprised at how these fit + the quality!
html:
1. Obsessed with these key lime pie bars!

2. I am still in love my with oura ring. Just an FYI.

3. How to slow down your summer. Obsessed.

4. I want to make a goal of eating outside at least three times a week this summer.

5. I totally agree that jalapeños seem less spicier these days.

6. TV things!! I watched all of Sirens – oh so good! I love Julianne Moore. And the episode of Your Friends and Neighbors was so good!

7. A working mom’s tips on how she reads so many books!

8. New podcast love alert: The Dating Detectives. One of you mentioned it and I almost binged the whole thing already. It’s like really excellent versions of catfish.

9. I live in dresses in the summer (they’re just so easy) and have found SO many good ones on amazon the last two seasons. Very pleasantly surprised at how these fit + the quality!
